text: Andris Bērziņš (born August 4, 1951) is a Latvian politician. He was born in Riga. He was Prime Minister of Latvia from May 5, 2000 to November 7, 2002. He is a member of the Latvian Way political party. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors Category:Prime Ministers of Latvia
title: Andris Bērziņš (Latvian Prime Minister)
